courses.title: Introduction to Music Theory
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of music theory, including scales, intervals, and basic harmony.

courses.title: Advanced Guitar Techniques
courses.description: Explore advanced techniques for guitar players, including fingerstyle, tapping, and improvisation.

courses.title: Music Production Basics
courses.description: Get started with music production, covering the basics of DAWs, recording, and mixing.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation
courses.description: Master the art of improvising jazz solos and understanding jazz harmony.

courses.title: Music Composition for Film
courses.description: Learn to compose music for film, focusing on emotion-driven orchestration and sound design.

courses.title: Music Production with Ableton Live
courses.description: An in-depth course teaching music production techniques using Ableton Live software.
